Class: dateField

textField. dateField

Datefield custom web component

Constructor

new dateField()

Properties:
Name Type Description
format string Date formatting for datefield value, format conventions is same with momentjs formatting conventions see http://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/
Source:
  • dateField.js, line 1
Examples

Datefield widget basic usage

<j-datefield id="date">Date</j-datefield>

Datefield formatting

<j-datefield format="DD MMM YYYY">Date</j-datefield>

Extends

  • textField

Methods

val(value) → {mixed}

Set and get widget value
Parameters:
Name Type Description
value mixed can be empty
Inherited From:
  • textField#val
Source:
  • textField.js, line 45
Returns:
Type
mixed
Examples

nopreview

var value = $('#myWidget').val() // will return widget's value to variable value

nopreview

$('#myWidget').val('myValue') // will set widget's value to 'myValue'
